name: Red Blue White
description:
Goal of the game is to complete level without touching the red.Blue helps you remember.

My plane for the game is to make it fun and enjoyable to play.Graphics and visuals are simple and game will probably and fast paced .If you have some ideas for the game that you would like to see comment that in the comments below

This is my first game so i hope you like it.I every day learn something new about developing games so end result will probably be better.

I will like you if you support me, so i can do game development for living

  1. Slowmotion
  2. Height jumping
  • Enemies:
  1. Everything that is red
  • 1.Update:
  1. Added lens flare.
  • 2.Update
  1. Added Sound to buttons
  2. Fullscreen
  3. Added cover picture on main menu
  4. Soundtrack
  • Next updates:
  1. More levels
  2. More enemy
  3. Hardcore mode( coming soon)

Made by:Darko Goluža
